text: Shinkō suru mono yo, jasui no ōku o harae. Hontōni jasui wa, tokiniha tsumidearu. Muyō no sensaku o shi tari mata tagaini kageguchi shite wa naranai. Shinda kyōdai no niku o, taberu no o dare ga konomou ka. Anata gata wa sore o imikiraude wanai ka. Arrā o osore nasai. Hontōni arrā wa tabitabi yurusa reru kata, jihibukai hō de ara reru
